attributes.description:
Anyone looking for such as low mileage Bakkie, this is the right Bakkie for you. This Semi Leather interior Bakkie with a mileage Below 95000KM, is in an Immaculate condition and It is Ideal for both business and private uses.
It has specs and features including:
Air Conditioning, Power Steering Wheel, Semi Leather Seats, Radio/CD/MP3 and a Canopy.  Spare Keys and Service History is available. Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
